main event: An unidentified flying object was observed on May 13, 1955, in Old Town, Maine.
interesting points: The object was described as a circular red flaming object the size of a quarter held at arm's length., The sighting lasted for 1-3 minutes., The object moved straight down and disappeared as it turned itself off., The observer initially thought the object was a star due to its size., The sighting took place at night under clear skies with stars visible.
witness description: The witness was a barber who noticed the object while sitting at the edge of his bed.
